snippet: The China Railway Construction Corporation said three men were killed by gunmen who attacked a hotel, and the airline Volga-Dnepr said six Russian employees were also killed.
abstract: Authorities identify some of 19 victims killed in terrorist attack on Radisson Blu Hotel in Mali; among dead are senior business executives from China and six employees for Russian airline Volga-Dnepr.

byline.original: By JANE PERLEZ and NEIL MacFARQUHAR
byline.contributor: Jane Perlez reported from Beijing, and Neil MacFarquhar from Moscow. Daniel Slotnik contributed reporting from New York, and Yufan Huang contributed research.

lead_paragraph: The China Railway Construction Corporation said three men were killed by gunmen who attacked a hotel, and the airline Volga-Dnepr said six Russian employees were also killed.

headline.main: 9 Foreigners Killed in Mali Are Identified
headline.print_headline: 9 Foreigners Killed in Mali Are Identified
